package.name: robot_hardware_bridge
package.description:
Hardware Bridge for robot system (RELAY ONLY - NO AUTHORITY)
This package provides both C++ and Python implementations: - bridge_node_cpp: C++ version for real-time performance - bridge_node: Python version for flexibility
The node: - Performs SCHEMA validation only (field types, array lengths) - Relays trajectories to the RT Controller - Publishes joint states from Controller to ROS
This node does NOT: - Perform semantic validation (joint limits, velocities) - Control motors - Make safety decisions
All semantic validation is performed by the RT Controller.
